Package networking.server

Class ServerGame

java.lang.Object
othellogame.model.OthelloGame
networking.server.ServerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class ServerGame extends OthelloGame
Extension of the OthelloGame class for server-side game management.
Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy
